Title: Sympathy for the Goddess
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Joe Henderson, Mike Costa (story editor), Chris Rafferty (story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: Charlotte helps Lucifer and Chloe find out who killed the man who had the last piece of the Flaming Sword.
